channel.title: Azure on Muhammad Hassan Raza
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Muhammad Hassan Raza

item.title: Obfuscating Images with Django & Azure Cloud Storage
item.description: A deep dive into my Django project that obfuscates images by embedding executable files and storing them securely on Azure Blob Storage.

item.title: Smart Dustbin with IoT: Arduino, Python, Kotlin & Azure
item.description: An in-depth look at my IoT-based smart dustbin project, built using Arduino, Python, Kotlin for Android, and Azure for real-time monitoring.
